amendment.description: An amendment numbered 9 printed in Part A of House Report 116-79 to require the Assistant Director and Student Loan Ombudsman to issue an annual report to Congress on risks to young consumers and student borrowers.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bonamici amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A009) offered by Ms. Bonamici.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Bonamici amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
